knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

### Load the 'tidyverse' package:

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

### Check the current working directory:

```{r}
getwd()
```



### Load the fish data set:

```{r}
fish <- read_csv("data/Gaeta_etal_CLC_data.csv")
fish
```

### Transform the fish data to only include the variables lakeid and length:

```{r}
fishlength <- select(fish, "lakeid", "length")
```

### Filter the fish data:

```{r}
only_BO <- filter(fish, lakeid=="BO")
```

### Calculate the mean length of fish from lake "BO"

```{r}
anyNA(only_BO)
mean(only_BO$length)
```
